## Source: amazon-inspector (d146e3723013cdb936cc74fc9a48a5aa197031f136e710ce28e0ceda08d8399d)
The package app_storefront_core was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4859d8c828588ea3e64acc51b7f9551c490377f7ed51cbe3df96ab748aaf8f3d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'app_storefront_core' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
